description: Customer is unable to log into their account. Every time they try, the system returns an error message.
Website page fails to load completely. It hangs at 50% and then crashes.
The customer reported a failure during checkout. Payment was declined but their card was charged.
The customer’s order was confirmed but has not been shipped yet. Tracking shows no movement.
The customer received a defective product. The item is missing some essential parts.
Customer requested a refund for an order, but it has not been processed yet despite the promise of a 5-day turnaround.
Customer’s account was mistakenly suspended. They have contacted support but have not received a resolution yet.
Website takes too long to load, and pages are sometimes unresponsive.
Customer finds the product recommendation feature to be inaccurate and irrelevant.
Customer is unable to reset their password. They are not receiving the reset email despite multiple attempts.
Customer’s order was expected to arrive in 3 days, but it's been over a week with no updates on tracking.
The customer was charged the wrong amount. They were billed for an item that was out of stock.
Customers are facing an error at checkout, and the page won’t proceed to payment. Multiple complaints received.
The customer’s account was deactivated by mistake. They are requesting reactivation urgently.
The customer is seeing incorrect tracking information on their order. They are requesting more details.
Customer reports that the mobile app crashes every time they try to log in. They are using an iPhone 13.
The customer received a completely different item than what they ordered. They are requesting a replacement.
Customer returned an item 10 days ago but hasn’t received a refund yet. They are requesting an update.
The customer was charged more than expected for their subscription renewal. They are asking for a refund of the overcharge.
Customer stopped receiving email notifications for order updates and account activity.
There is a broken link on the product page that leads to a 404 error. The customer flagged this issue.
Customer sent a message to support a week ago but has not received a reply yet. They are seeking a resolution.
Customer suggested adding a 'dark mode' feature to the website. They are waiting for confirmation on this request.
Customer made a mistake while entering the shipping address. They are requesting a change before shipment.
Customer entered a promotional code at checkout but was not able to apply it. They are asking for assistance.
